results.title: Association of metformin use with asthma development and adverse outcomes: A systematic review and meta-analysis.
results.text_hl: However, the conclusion is not so certain, and longer observation and more evidence are still required. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ still shows some potential in the intervention of @<m>DISEASE_Respiratory_Tract_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012140 @@@respiratory diseases@@@.

results.title: Reduced mortality from lower respiratory tract disease in adult diabetic patients treated with metformin.
results.text_hl: Therefore, we examined the association of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use with the risk of mortality from @<m>DISEASE_Respiratory_Tract_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012140 @@@CLRD@@@.

results.title: Metformin and its clinical use: new insights for an old drug in clinical practice
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@Lactic acidosis@@@ could be decreased by avoiding @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Hypovolemia @DISEASE_MESH:D020896 @@@hypovolemia@@@, @DISEASE_Sepsis @DISEASE_MESH:D018805 @@@sepsis@@@, @DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@renal impairment@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Respiratory_Tract_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012140 @@@hypoxic respiratory diseases@@@ and @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart failure@@@, in the preoperative period and before intravenous injection of contrast media.

citations.NLM: Cicero AF, Tartagni E, Ertek S. Metformin and its clinical use: new insights for an old drug in clinical practice Arch Med Sci. 2012 Nov 9;8(5):907-17. PMID: 23185203
